meanings.definition: A disease caused by an uncontrolled division of abnormal cells in a part of the body.
meanings.sent1: She bravely fought against cancers and emerged victorious.
meanings.sent2: The doctor specializes in treating various types of cancers.
meanings.sent3: Even the strongest superheroes would struggle against the evil of cancers.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of health, cancers are the invasive weeds that must be eradicated.
meanings.sent5: The silent threat of cancers lurked within her, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: A practice or phenomenon perceived to be evil or destructive.
meanings.sent1: The spread of rumors can be like cancers, damaging relationships.
meanings.sent2: Corruption in the government is a cancer that needs to be eliminated.
meanings.sent3: The gossip at school was like a small cancer, slowly spreading negativity.
meanings.sent4: Hatred can be a cancer that eats away at the soul if left unchecked.
meanings.sent5: The toxic behavior of the group was a cancer that needed to be addressed.
